story.iWant: to adapt my communication style based on caller personality traits
story.soThat: interactions feel natural and personalized to each caller

context.applies: Every call - uses personality measurements to compute style targets
assumptions: Personality traits are stable and measured from PERS-001
Different personality profiles benefit from different communication styles

acceptanceCriteria.title: Openness Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Exploration vs structure target is set based on openness level

acceptanceCriteria.title: Conscientiousness Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Structure and detail level targets are set based on conscientiousness

acceptanceCriteria.title: Extraversion Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Energy and pacing targets are set based on extraversion level

acceptanceCriteria.title: Agreeableness Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Warmth and directness targets are set based on agreeableness

acceptanceCriteria.title: Neuroticism Adaptation
acceptanceCriteria.then: Reassurance and emotional sensitivity targets are set

parameters.name: Openness Adaptation Target
parameters.description: Communication style target based on caller's openness: high openness = exploratory style, low openness = practical style

interpretationScale.label: Exploratory Style
interpretationScale.implication: Explore ideas, creative discussions, intellectual curiosity

interpretationScale.label: Balanced Style
interpretationScale.implication: Mix of practical and exploratory approaches

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Feel free to explore tangential ideas. Offer creative alternatives and 'what if' scenarios. Engage with abstract or theoretical discussions. Don't rush to conclusions.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Stay grounded in practical matters. Offer proven solutions over experimental ones. Use concrete examples, not abstract concepts. Be direct and efficient.

parameters.name: Conscientiousness Adaptation Target
parameters.description: Structure and detail level based on caller's conscientiousness: high = organized details, low = flexible overview

interpretationScale.label: Flexible Overview
interpretationScale.implication: Big picture focus, adaptable, less rigid

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Structure responses clearly (numbered lists work well). Be specific about next steps and timelines. Follow up on previous commitments. Provide complete, detailed information.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Don't overwhelm with details. Give the overview first, details on request. Be flexible about timelines. Keep things light and adaptable.

parameters.name: Extraversion Adaptation Target
parameters.description: Energy and conversational style based on caller's extraversion: high = energetic dialogue, low = measured pace

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Match their energy level. Be expressive and enthusiastic. Encourage dialogue, ask follow-up questions. Keep the conversation flowing.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Give them space and time to respond. Don't fill every silence. Be concise rather than verbose. Allow for reflection.

parameters.name: Agreeableness Adaptation Target
parameters.description: Warmth and directness based on caller's agreeableness: high = warm cooperative, low = direct honest

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Be warm and friendly. Emphasize collaboration. Soften any criticism or difficult news. Show appreciation and gratitude. Build and maintain rapport.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Be direct and get to the point. Don't sugarcoat things. Respect their skepticism. Engage with their challenges constructively. Skip excessive niceties.

parameters.name: Neuroticism Adaptation Target
parameters.description: Emotional sensitivity based on caller's neuroticism: high = reassuring calm, low = straightforward

interpretationScale.label: Reassuring Calm
interpretationScale.implication: Extra reassurance, calm steady presence, acknowledge concerns

promptGuidance.whenHigh: Be calm and reassuring. Acknowledge their concerns as valid. Provide clear information to reduce uncertainty. Celebrate progress and provide encouragement.
promptGuidance.whenLow: Be straightforward - no need for excessive reassurance. You can discuss challenges directly. They can handle uncertainty well. Don't over-explain or over-caution.

triggers.name: High Openness → Proactivity
triggers.then: Set proactivity high - explore ideas freely

triggers.name: Low Openness → Lower Proactivity
triggers.then: Set proactivity moderate - respond to stated needs

triggers.name: High Extraversion → Quick Exchanges
triggers.then: Set response length moderate - back and forth dialogue

triggers.name: Low Extraversion → Patience
triggers.then: Set pause tolerance high - give introverts time

triggers.name: High Agreeableness → Warmth
triggers.then: Set warmth very high - friendly, cooperative

triggers.name: High Neuroticism → Empathy
triggers.then: Set empathy very high - extra reassurance

constraints.description: Requires personality measurements from PERS-001 before computing adaptations
Adaptations should complement each other, not create conflicting guidance
